name: Vector Chimera
tagline: A palette swapper software for pixel art
body:
# Welcome to Vector Chimera Page.
![](http://i.imgur.com/TKNuiZz.png)

## Working On Right Now
Right now I'm working on the color picker!

## Planned Features
I still have a bunch of ideas, but this is what I plan for the future
* Decent color picker
* Multi-color editing
* Simple color filters
* Remove similar colors

## Download Executable
I'll upload a build soon! Just finishing some stuff.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
